text: KSEK-FM (99.1 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a classic rock format. Licensed to Girard, Kansas, United States, it serves the Pittsburg area. The station is currently owned by American Media Investments, Inc. Before June 24, 2013, the station broadcast a sports talk format. Before June 1, 2010, the station broadcast an active rock format. KSEK is home to Pittsburg High School sports broadcasts. They also are an affiliate of the syndicated Pink Floyd show "Floydian Slip." ==Previous logo== File:KSEK-FM Logo.png ==External links== * SEK-FM Category:Radio stations established in 1977
title: KSEK-FM
